snippet.title: Dungeons 3 - Golden Pickaxe Event Trailer (US)
snippet.description:
Join the treasure hunt now!
Get Dungeons 3 here: 
https://www.kalypsomedia.com/dungeons-3

Beginning on 15th April and running indefinitely, the Golden Pickaxe Event introduces a new treasure-hunting challenge to the acclaimed dungeon management sim across all platforms (PC, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One). 

In the event, the world of Dungeons 3 will suddenly be populated with mysterious golden pickaxes, with one appearing in a mission from each DLC released to date, along with the main game. Naturally, it’s down to the players to gather them up, with a selection of in-game goodies waiting to be unlocked and an extra special reward awaiting anyone that can locate a pickaxe in every piece of Dungeons 3 DLC. Rumour has it that this final reward has some connection to a faraway world…but what could it be?

Dungeons 3 is the biggest, best and evil-est game in the series yet, bringing all the humour and strategic depth of classic dungeon management sims to a whole new modern audience with an extensive singleplayer campaign, two player co-op mode, and a fully re-worked overworld RTS mode.
